attributes.action: Scrap the BBC licence fee, and make BBC a Subscription Service
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC licence fee is an old and outdated method of charging for a channel, they still allow a fee for a black and white tv at £57! 
The BBC should be an optional subscription service, the same as many other channels. This would allow a much more affordable option and reduce the risk of people avoiding paying licence fees.
attributes.background: Th government has the power to overturn the TV licensing fee. Labour have already considered scrapping the fee, now it needs to be put in motion.
